summary: A single father is more occupied with his race horse than his daughter.
cast: Daniel Gustavsson|Märta Ferm|Frida Hallgren|Mona Malm|Daniela Svensson|Samuli Edelmann|Leif Andrée|Björn Bengtsson|Peter Viitanen|Roger Storm|Bengt Schött|Magnus Härenstam|Hans G. Lindskog|Sven Melander|Stig H. Johansson|Erik Adielsson|Robbin-Arjey-Josefsson|Göran Holm|Christian Kinell
title: Winners and Losers
